/* package codechef; // don't place package name! */

import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

/* Name of the class has to be "Main" only if the class is public. */
class Codechef
{
    private final static Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
    private static String auth;

    private static void run(int n) {
        System.out.println(auth.substring(0, n));
    }

    private static void init() {
        int[] fib = new int[88];
        fib[0]=fib[1] = 0;
        for (int i=2; i<fib.length; i++) { fib[i] = (1 + fib[i-1] + fib[i-2])%26; }
        char[] sequence = new char[fib.length];
        for (int i=0; i<fib.length; i++) { sequence[i] = (char)('A' + fib[i]); }
        auth = String.valueOf(sequence);
    }

	public static void main (String[] args) throws java.lang.Exception
	{
	    init();
	    int tests = in.nextInt();
	    while(tests-->0) {
	        run(in.nextInt());
	    }
	}
}
